name: Little Life: Adaptivity
description:
Observe and adapt!

A unique puzzle platformer where player's actions affect the environment.

"We are all connected - to each other and to our environment."

Features:

  • Indirectly control platforms.
  • No tutorials. Level design allows you to understand mechanics.
  • 50 levels.

Xbox Gamepad controls:

  • D-Pad/Left Stick - Move
  • A - Jump/Select

Keyboard controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys - Move and Jump

**If you like the game, please consider donating to support the developer**
